member.name: M:USD.NET.Unity.MaterialSample.Bind(USD.NET.Scene,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Binds the prim to the given material. https://graphics.pixar.com/usd/docs/api/class_usd_shade_material.html#a116ed8259600f7a48f3792364252a4e1

member.name: M:USD.NET.Unity.MaterialSample.Unbind(USD.NET.Scene,System.String)
member.summary: Unbinds the prim from all materials. https://graphics.pixar.com/usd/docs/api/class_usd_shade_material.html#a6fc9d56d2e2e826aa3d96711c7b0e605

member.name: T:USD.NET.Unity.DiagnosticHandler
member.summary: Implements a DiagnosticHandler which pipes messages to Unity's debug logger.

member.name: M:USD.NET.Unity.DiagnosticHandler.Register
member.summary: Registers this class a the global diagnostic handler.

member.name: M:USD.NET.Unity.DiagnosticHandler.OnFatalError(System.String)
member.summary: Messages sent when an unrecoverable fatal error occured in the USD API.

member.name: M:USD.NET.Unity.DiagnosticHandler.OnError(System.String)
member.summary: Messages sent when an error occured in the USD API, but was not fatal.

member.name: M:USD.NET.Unity.DiagnosticHandler.OnWarning(System.String)
member.summary: Warning messages sent from the USD API upon misuse or unexpected run-time conditions.

member.name: M:USD.NET.Unity.DiagnosticHandler.OnInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Informational messages sent from the USD API.

member.name: M:USD.NET.Unity.UnityTypeConverter.GetPath(UnityEngine.Transform)
member.summary: Returns a valid UsdPath for the given Unity GameObject.
member.remarks: Note that illegal characters are converted into legal characters, so invalid names may collide in the USD namespace.

members.member: Returns just the RGB elements of a Color array as a new Vector3 array.
